about_the_game:
“Wake up, wake up! Can you hear me Geo-Duck? The moment of truth has arrived.”

You are but a lowly lizard summoned to greatness by celestial voices. Jesus has gone missing and only you can bring him back alive.

Lead a band of angels on a quest to find Jesus and save Christmas from hyper-secularization. Dress those angels up in the latest fashions, including but not limited to khakis, polo shirts, dreadlocks, hotpants, mohawks, and many more.

Collect many instruments along the way, each with a unique play style, and use them to dissemble inanimate objects through the power of sound. Never forget your cosmic origins! Walk the line between fantasy and reality in a world that really is out to get you.

GEO-DEUX is the long-awaited sequel to Geo-Duck, a 2d musical platformer from the pioneering glitch-hop duo Your Infamous Harp. Based to some extent on a true story, and featuring a lovable cast of characters that were personally trained, housed and fed by the developers.

“Are you feeling lonely? Are you tired or depressed? Come visit the CLINIC to get rid of your stress!”

Pay a visit to the CLINIC to dissolve your ego and resolve your existential angst - forever. Traverse a 6x6 grid of levels encompassing the entire visible universe and beyond. Described as “fun” by one tester, you just won’t not want to play!
detailed_description:
“Wake up, wake up! Can you hear me Geo-Duck? The moment of truth has arrived.”

You are but a lowly lizard summoned to greatness by celestial voices. Jesus has gone missing and only you can bring him back alive.

Lead a band of angels on a quest to find Jesus and save Christmas from hyper-secularization. Dress those angels up in the latest fashions, including but not limited to khakis, polo shirts, dreadlocks, hotpants, mohawks, and many more.

Collect many instruments along the way, each with a unique play style, and use them to dissemble inanimate objects through the power of sound. Never forget your cosmic origins! Walk the line between fantasy and reality in a world that really is out to get you.

GEO-DEUX is the long-awaited sequel to Geo-Duck, a 2d musical platformer from the pioneering glitch-hop duo Your Infamous Harp. Based to some extent on a true story, and featuring a lovable cast of characters that were personally trained, housed and fed by the developers.

“Are you feeling lonely? Are you tired or depressed? Come visit the CLINIC to get rid of your stress!”

Pay a visit to the CLINIC to dissolve your ego and resolve your existential angst - forever. Traverse a 6x6 grid of levels encompassing the entire visible universe and beyond. Described as “fun” by one tester, you just won’t not want to play!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 12.1
  • Processor: 1.8GHz, Apple Silicon or Intel
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest Mac OS X
  • Processor: 2.4GHz, Apple Silicon or Intel
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: GEO-DEUX

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

short_description: Do not forget your cosmic origins! Travel the universe to find Jesus and save Christmas once and for all.
